definition: level (device to determine horizontal)/spirit level/surveyor's level
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: e pulled out his level and put it on the scaffold to show that the scaffold was level.
sentences.chinese: 于是承包商拿出水平仪放在脚手架上说明这是水平的。

sentences.english: Level off the shelves with a spirit level.
Leg levelers and warning label are standard.
sentences.chinese: 腿水平仪和警告标签均为标准。

sentences.english: You can summon digital overlays in the viewfinder, including a horizon level.
sentences.chinese: 你可以增添喜欢的数码滤镜，或者水平仪。

sentences.english: In order to adjust the level, we may screw the bolt up or down.
sentences.chinese: 我们上下拧动螺钉以调节该水平仪。

sentences.english: Install the base on the ground, and adjust even using the level.
sentences.chinese: 将底座安装在已打好的基础上，并用水平仪调平。

definition: level (device to determine horizontal)/spirit level/surveyor's level
set square (tool to measure right angles)
